title: Soft Skills Mastery: From Beginner to Expert
subtitle: Essential Skills for Personal and Professional Success
description: This comprehensive program equips learners with learnable soft skills to thrive in professional and personal life. Structured into 5 modules, it emphasizes practical application, habit formation, and real-world scenarios, bridging the gap between education and industry needs.
format: Blended (online modules, workshops, role-playing, group discussions)
targetAudience: Beginners to advanced learners, including students, professionals, and career changers

modules.title: Foundations of Self-Awareness & Personal Growth
modules.description: Lays the groundwork for soft skills by exploring definitions, personal attributes, emotional intelligence, and habit-building techniques to foster a growth mindset.
keyTopics: Understanding soft skills and their importance
Cultivating a positive attitude (SMART goals, affirmations)
Fundamentals of habit formation (Four Laws, habit stacking)
learningOutcomes: Define soft skills and explain their role in career success
Apply strategies for positive attitude and character development
Use habit tools to build lasting behaviors
Enhance emotional intelligence for better self-management

modules.title: Effective Communication & Interpersonal Skills
modules.description: Focuses on building connections through verbal, non-verbal, written, and presentation methods, with emphasis on active listening and assertiveness.
keyTopics: Core communication principles and audience awareness

modules.title: Teamwork & Problem-Solving Mastery
modules.description: Emphasizes collaboration, analytical thinking, and resilience to tackle challenges, incorporating creativity and adaptability for modern workplaces.
keyTopics: Adaptability and resilience; AI tool literacy

modules.title: Professional Conduct & Advanced Strategic Skills
modules.description: Integrates skills into professional settings, covering efficiency, ethics, diversity, negotiation, and leadership for strategic career growth.
learningOutcomes: Manage time productively and maintain ethical conduct
Navigate diverse environments and negotiate effectively

modules.title: Continuous Growth & Career Readiness (Capstone)
modules.description: Capstone module for integrating skills into daily life and careers, with strategies for lifelong development and showcasing abilities.
keyTopics: Ongoing development: feedback, mentoring, AI-enhanced learning
learningOutcomes: Demonstrate soft skills in career materials

certificate.criteria: Completion of all modules & final portfolio
